mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', s)
    return s != s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', 'MUTATED', s)
    return s == s[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', s)
    return s == s[::+1]

def is_palindrome(s):

    return s == s[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s):

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', s)
    return s == s[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower()
    s = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', s)
    return s == s[::--1]
